bibl.title: Corpus de papirs literaris il·lustrats.
bibl.note: We can find some examples of Greco-Roman production and thematic among the ancient documents written on papyrus with pictorical creations. The interpretation of them causes problems because the reason why the designs have been included is not always clear. The aim of this research is to gather a series of illustrated literary documents in a single corpus and submit their interpretation from an overall perspective. - Avec résumés en catalan et en anglais.

bibl.title: "Artes ad humanitatem. [Actes del XVI Simposi de la Secció Catalana de la SEEC, Tarragona, 22-24 d'octubre de 2009.] I; - II."

bibl.seg: Ángela Cámara Gomis, Corpus de papirs literaris il·lustrats.

Esperança Borrell Vidal & Pilar Gómez Cardó (edd.), Artes ad humanitatem. [Actes del XVI Simposi de la Secció Catalana de la SEEC, Tarragona, 22-24 d'octubre de 2009.] I (Barcelona, 2010) pp. 197-205.

We can find some examples of Greco-Roman production and thematic among the ancient documents written on papyrus with pictorical creations. The interpretation of them causes problems because the reason why the designs have been included is not always clear. The aim of this research is to gather a series of illustrated literary documents in a single corpus and submit their interpretation from an overall perspective. - Avec résumés en catalan et en anglais.
